'''Karmaphala Wood Bulk Goods Berth''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Karmaphala Wood Bulk Goods Berth is obtainable from [[Menakeri's Treasure Shop]] for 10 [[Dendro Sigil]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
